title: Crackshot的音效怎么设置
author: 123456789xxxxx
txt_content: 请问Crackshot的音效怎么填写，我恨复制，给个网址也行。

replies.author: Koke_Cacao
replies.txt_content:

ZOMBIE_WOODBREAK复制代码
SOUND-VOLUME-PITCH-DELAY
声音类型(上面的类型)-音量(0~1之间是音量, 超过1会增加范围)-偏移(一般填写1)-延迟(20=1秒)

例子Shooting:
        Cancel_Left_Click_Block_Damage: true
        Cancel_Right_Click_Interactions: true
        Projectile_Amount: 1
        Projectile_Type: energy
        Projectile_Subtype: 40-1-NONE-0
        Projectile_Damage: 12
        Sounds_Shoot: WITHER_SHOOT-1-2-0,EXPLODE-1-2-0
    Reload:
        Enable: true
        Reload_Amount: 8
        Reload_Bullets_Individually: true
        Reload_Duration: 10
        Sounds_Reloading: IRONGOLEM_THROW-1-2-2复制代码
Sounds_Shoot: WITHER_SHOOT-1-2-0,EXPLODE-1-2-0
指的是但射击时同时播放凋灵凋灵声音和爆炸声音, 无延迟
Sounds_Reloading: IRONGOLEM_THROW-1-2-2
指的是当换弹时播放铁傀儡扔生物的声音在20分之2秒后
